index.title: Angular Docs
index.subtitle: JavaScript
index.banner: The latest Angular release is 4.0. Learn about the latest updates to the documentation. View the Angular change log for enhancements, fixes, and breaking changes in Angular itself. If you’re looking for Angular v2 documents, you’ll find them at v2.angular.io.

quickstart.title: Quickstart
quickstart.subtitle: JavaScript
quickstart.description: Get up and running with Angular
quickstart.banner: This QuickStart guide demonstrates how to build and run a simple Angular application.

glossary.subtitle: JavaScript
glossary.intro: Brief definitions of the most important words in the Angular vocabulary
